resources.string: sunshine
OK
START
NEXT
In the beginning, there were many gods. Four gods were involved in the creation of humans, each representing life, spirit, peace, and knowledge respectively.
You, now an adult, stand before the Sun Sword and slowly reach out to grab its hilt.\n\nYour journey begins now.
Nice to meet you, The braver!\nI am the storyteller who will record your adventures from now on.

…But the title of the braver,
Isn't it too stiff?

What should I call you?

<&name>,
That's a good name.

I'm really looking forward to the journey with you.
By the way, what does &name sir look like?\n\nPerhaps the darkness around here is hindering my vision.
Ah, I can see it clearly now.\n\nAs expected, you have the qualities of the braver. You look so classy.

Before starting the journey, There are a few things you need to know.

&name is what the braver needs
About the 4 abilities, ‘stats’
Did you know?

Stats include Strength (STR), Spirit (SPI), There is Peace (PEA) and Knowledge (KNO). \n\nYou can raise your stats through quests, Once you reach a certain number, you can receive recognition from the corresponding god.
If you are recognized by all four gods, you will be eligible to draw the Sun Sword.\n\nBut, If you do not draw your sword within 70 days, The kingdom will be destroyed.
By the way, aren’t you curious about your current stats?\n\nMost of the bravers start with basic stats, but sometimes that doesn\'t happen.
Great. Then please answer the questions I ask from now on.\n\nPlease keep in mind that you must answer honestly so that we can determine your exact stats and request an appropriate quest.

Hmm… you were a lot more than I expected.

Some quests might feel too easy for you. 

Do you still want to continue?
Great! Let’s learn more about &name sir.\n\nI would like to ask a question about the &name sir\'s recent status.

Thank you for your hard work.

Based on the question, the &name sir's current stats are…

It's &stat1 Strength, &stat2 Spirit, &stat3 Peace, and &stat4 Knowledge!
It\'s okay if your stats aren\'t high right away.\n\nAny insufficient stats can be quickly built up through quests.

Great! Now it's time to start the real journey.

I will help you receive and complete your first quest.

Follow me!
> Nice to meet you.
> My name is…
> Thank you.
> What do I look like…
> I\'m a little shy.
> What is that?
> I see.
> Better hurry.
> Curious!
> Got it.
> Fine, let\'s continue.
> Go ahead.
> Hmm…
> Okay.
> Let\'s go!
First question.\n\nIs your current social withdrawal period longer than 3 months?
Second question.\n\nDo you mostly stay in your room or home?
Third question.\n\nEven if you go out intermittently and temporarily, don\'t you have interpersonal relationships outside of your family?
Fourth question.\n\nDo you think that the reason for social withdrawal is not intellectual disability or mental illness?
First question.\n\nDo you spend most of the day at home?
Second question.\n\nAre you afraid of failing and can\'t do anything?
Third question.\n\nDo you have few people to discuss important issues with?
The last question.\n\nAre you afraid or unsure of working?
> N/A
> Little bit N/A
> Neither
> Little bit applicable
> Applicable
Please tell me your name
What do you look like?
> Yes
> No
Enter a valid name
SELECT MODE
CHALLENGE MODE
If you do not draw your sword within 70 days, The kingdom is destroyed.
FREE MODE
There is no time limit, You can choose a quest and perform it there is. Clear challenge mode to unlock.
SUNSHINE
- TAP TO START -
Before we begin our journey, I will briefly explain how to play.\n\n(Touch to continue)
You can check current status through the screen at the top.
Balanced stats are important to save the world.
Every stat has to exceed 100 to be eligible to pull out a Sun Sword.
But better hurry, Only 70 days are left until the kingdom falls.
Performing the daily quests gives you stat and experience points.
You can move to the quest scroll by clicking the icon in the upper left corner.
In the quest scroll, you can check currently ongoing quests, completed quests, etc.
Right below is a Diary containing your journey!
You can keep track of your adventures, set up an adventure environment in your Diary.
it sounds like a quest has been given today! Shall we check it out?
Kingdom falls in
Loading user…
Every stat has to exceed 100 to be eligible to pull out a Sun Sword.
You can pull out the "sun sword". Would you like to draw on?
The beginning after the end
Your world is just beginning. Based on the your journal, I\'ve selected new journeys..
CLOSE
COMPLETE QUEST
Congrats! \nYou completed the quest!
Enter answer to complete quest.
Upload photo to complete quest.
Finish your daily routine and \npress \"COMPLETE QUEST\".
Set timer, complete the mission and \npress \"COMPLETE QUEST\".
Logout
